description:
fresh from a trip through mexico (involving the orbzone's own DJ Infinite Justice, Idiom Freak, and Chris Rockmaster Donkey D*ck Lewis), the janitor is back with your weekly dose of people yelling things at cops and stuff!

...part 85 of the #Fuck12 journey is part number 9 (number 9, number 9, number 9, num..) of our focus on #Ottawa and #FreedomConvoy2022, and it's heavy and thick and features a lot of swearing canadians (!!), lying canadian politicians (not "!!"), and if you listen you can hear how the janitor himself almost got arrested by corrupt 12 themselves in Mexico! 3 hour show.

episodeName: the orbzone- fuck 12, pt 84 (focus on Ottawa (Freedom Convoy 2022), pt 8)  4-10-22
description:
"(At the #FreedomConvoy2022, in #Ottawa) one woman was trampled by police on horseback who barged through a crowd standing in protest on Friday. The woman, a Native woman who was on a walker, was seriously injured, according to the police’s watchdog agency, the Special Investigations Unit. She is recovering in the hospital. She was filmed saying, “This is what we are doing it for. So we can have peace, and love and happiness,” just before she was trampled by the horses." 2.5 hour show.

#NativeLivesMatter #
